flawed_nl_solution:
Sandy's fingernails will grow a total of ( 0.1 ) * 12 = <<(0.1)*12=0.12>>0.12 inches per year.
To achieve the world record, Sandy needs to grow her fingernails a total of 26 - 2 = <<26-2=24>>24 inches.
It will take her a total of 24 / 0.12 = <<24/0.12=200>>200 years.
Sandy will be 12 + 200 = <<12+200=212>>212 years old when she achieves the world record.
#### 212

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 1.2000000000000002, not 0.12. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
